articles.title: Snapchat makes its first open prompt AI Lens available for free in the US
articles.summary: Snapchat is expanding access to its AI-powered “Imagine Lens,” allowing all users to generate and edit images with custom prompts for free.
articles.content: Snapchat is expanding access to its AI-powered “Imagine Lens,” allowing all users to generate and edit images with custom prompts for free.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Why Cohere’s ex-AI research lead is betting against the scaling race
articles.summary: Cohere's former VP of AI research, Sara Hooker, is launching a new startup to build AI models that can adapt to their environment.
articles.content: Cohere's former VP of AI research, Sara Hooker, is launching a new startup to build AI models that can adapt to their environment.
articles.author: Maxwell Zeff

articles.title: OpenAI requested memorial attendee list in ChatGPT suicide lawsuit
articles.summary: The new information comes as the Raines family updated its lawsuit against OpenAI.  The family first filed a wrongful death suit against OpenAI in August after alleging their son had taken his own lif.
articles.content: The new information comes as the Raines family updated its lawsuit against OpenAI. The family first filed a wrongful death suit against OpenAI in August after alleging their son had taken his own life following conversations with the chatbot about his mental health and suicidal ideation.
articles.author: Rebecca Bellan

articles.title: OpenAI’s Atlas is more about ChatGPT than the web
articles.summary: OpenAI's new browser is a surface for the company to distribute ChatGPT and develop new AI features rather than improving core web experience.
articles.content: OpenAI's new browser is a surface for the company to distribute ChatGPT and develop new AI features rather than improving core web experience.
articles.author: Ivan Mehta

articles.title: Amazon unveils AI smart glasses for its delivery drivers
articles.summary: Amazon likely hopes that the new glasses will shave valuable time off of each delivery by providing delivery drivers with detailed directions and information about hazards directly in their line of si.
articles.content: Amazon likely hopes that the new glasses will shave valuable time off of each delivery by providing delivery drivers with detailed directions and information about hazards directly in their line of sight.
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: GM is bringing Google Gemini-powered AI assistant to cars in 2026
articles.summary: GM is the latest automaker to lean into generative AI-based assistants that promise to respond to driver requests in a more natural-sounding way.  Stellantis is collaborating with French AI firm Mistr.
articles.content: GM is the latest automaker to lean into generative AI-based assistants that promise to respond to driver requests in a more natural-sounding way. Stellantis is collaborating with French AI firm Mistral, Mercedes is integrating ChatGPT, and Tesla has brought xAI’s Grok to its vehicles.
articles.author: Rebecca Bellan

articles.title: Meta cuts 600 AI jobs amid ongoing reorganization
articles.summary: Meta continues to restructure its AI efforts after poaching more than 50 researchers from competing labs this summer.
articles.content: Meta continues to restructure its AI efforts after poaching more than 50 researchers from competing labs this summer.
articles.author: Amanda Silberling

articles.title: GM to introduce eyes-off, hands-off driving system in 2028
articles.summary: GM said Cruise’s technology stack, including its AI models trained on five million driverless miles and simulation framework, feed directly into the automaker’s next-generation driver assistance and a.
articles.content: GM said Cruise’s technology stack, including its AI models trained on five million driverless miles and simulation framework, feed directly into the automaker’s next-generation driver assistance and autonomy programs.
articles.author: Rebecca Bellan

articles.title: Several users reportedly complain to FTC that ChatGPT is causing psychological harm
articles.summary: At least seven people have complained to the U.  Federal Trade Commission that ChatGPT caused them to experience severe delusions, paranoia, and emotional crises, Wired reported.
articles.content: At least seven people have complained to the U.S. Federal Trade Commission that ChatGPT caused them to experience severe delusions, paranoia, and emotional crises, Wired reported.
articles.author: Ram Iyer

articles.title: David Sacks’ Craft leads $42M Series A in govtech startup Starbridge
articles.summary: Starbridge raises $42M Series A led by Craft Ventures to help businesses better monitor public service opportunities.
articles.content: Starbridge raises $42M Series A led by Craft Ventures to help businesses better monitor public service opportunities.
articles.author: Dominic-Madori Davis

articles.title: Sumble emerges from stealth with $38.5M to bring AI-powered context to sales intelligence
articles.summary: The founders of machine learning community Kaggle are trying to upend the crowded sales prospecting market with AI.  And they're making headway.
articles.content: The founders of machine learning community Kaggle are trying to upend the crowded sales prospecting market with AI. And they're making headway.

articles.title: Shuttle raises $6M to fix vibe-coding’s deployment problem
articles.summary: The platform engineering startup Shuttle announced $6 million in seed funding to handle the infrastructure problems that start where products like Lovable and Cursor leave off.
articles.content: The platform engineering startup Shuttle announced $6 million in seed funding to handle the infrastructure problems that start where products like Lovable and Cursor leave off.

articles.title: MCP prompt hijacking: Examining the major AI security threat
articles.summary: Security experts at JFrog have found a ‘prompt hijacking’ threat that exploits weak spots in how AI systems talk to each other using MCP (Model Context Protocol).  Business leaders want to make AI mor.
articles.content: Security experts at JFrog have found a ‘prompt hijacking’ threat that exploits weak spots in how AI systems talk to each other using MCP (Model Context Protocol). Business leaders want to make AI more helpful by directly using company data and tools. But, hooking AI up like this also opens up new se
articles.author: Ryan Daws

articles.title: Dispatch: Partying at one of Africa’s largest AI gatherings
articles.summary: It’s late August in Rwanda’s capital, Kigali, and people are filling a large hall at one of Africa’s biggest gatherings of minds in AI and machine learning.  The room is draped in white curtains, and .
articles.content: It’s late August in Rwanda’s capital, Kigali, and people are filling a large hall at one of Africa’s biggest gatherings of minds in AI and machine learning. The room is draped in white curtains, and a giant screen blinks with videos created with generative AI. A classic East African folk song by the
articles.author: Abdullahi Tsanni, SM ’23

articles.title: AI is changing how we build links for SEO
articles.summary: Link strategies are important in improving search engine optimisation (SEO) and online visibility.  Artificial intelligence is changing these strategies, making them more accurate and efficient.
articles.content: Link strategies are important in improving search engine optimisation (SEO) and online visibility. Artificial intelligence is changing these strategies, making them more accurate and efficient. This article examines AI’s impact on link strategies, highlighting current tools and future trends.
articles.author: Bazoom

articles.title: Netflix goes ‘all in’ on generative AI as entertainment industry remains divided
articles.summary: Netflix isn't planning to use generative AI as the backbone of its content but believes the technology has potential as a tool to make creatives more efficient.
articles.content: Netflix isn't planning to use generative AI as the backbone of its content but believes the technology has potential as a tool to make creatives more efficient.

articles.title: Open source agentic startup LangChain hits $1.25B valuation
articles.summary: As TechCrunch previously reported, the maker of a popular open source framework for building AI agents has officially become a unicorn.
articles.content: As TechCrunch previously reported, the maker of a popular open source framework for building AI agents has officially become a unicorn.
articles.author: Julie Bort

articles.title: Sesame, the conversational AI startup from Oculus founders, raises $250M and launches beta
articles.summary: Former Oculus CEO Brendan Iribe’s new startup, Sesame, is building AI-powered smart glasses with natural, humanlike voice interaction.  Backed by Sequoia and Spark, the company also launched an invite.
articles.content: Former Oculus CEO Brendan Iribe’s new startup, Sesame, is building AI-powered smart glasses with natural, humanlike voice interaction. Backed by Sequoia and Spark, the company also launched an invite-only iOS beta to preview its conversational AI.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: OpenAI’s new browser is a broadside shot at Google

articles.content: OpenAI's new browser announcement made it clear exactly how much Google has to lose in the AI era.

articles.title: Sources: Multimodal AI startup Fal AI already raised at $4B+ valuation
articles.summary: Fal provides developers with over 600 image, video, audio, and 3D models, it says, and boasts that its cloud has thousands of Nvidia H100 and H200 GPUs and is fine-tuned for speedy inference.
articles.content: Fal provides developers with over 600 image, video, audio, and 3D models, it says, and boasts that its cloud has thousands of Nvidia H100 and H200 GPUs and is fine-tuned for speedy inference.
